title: Meow'zahar needs to be a thing.
body:
{{champion:90}} PLEASE MAKE THIS A NEW MALZAHAR SKIN {{champion:90}} 

I think this could fit perfectly into the new skin line.
I'm not an artist, but I would love some fan art on this!

I can't stop calling him Meow'zahar now...

replies.body: I like Kog'Meow better.

> [{quoted}](name=AvantelWings,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FsLEPNZL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-13T21:52:17.334+0000)
>

Kittyling for passive.
Kitties playing with two balls of yarn for his Q.
Big puddle of milk for his W.
Angry kitties attacking for E.
Kitty(-ies) Meow/Rowr for R.

....how could this even remotely be a cute cat skin? >.>
This is the first general meeting of Crazy Cat Club, will Meowkai please pass the catnip.
The honorable Rengar-nyaan and Meowalee presiding.  We will consider nominations of additional members to this assembly.

Void Cats?
I want "cat" right MEOW
Just Claws it is so adorable.
Who the fuck votes no on this?
Dog trolls. They probably main susan {{champion:75}}

#$)@ man. This is amazing. And here I came on to be like "WE NEED PROGRAM MALZAHAR WITH ROBOT VOIDLINGS!!!"

But cats?! Thanks for one-upping me!

But aren't robot void creatures Viktor's creation?

Would love to have both by the time One for All comes to the FGM rotation, though.  Void bots, void cats, summon all the things.
Can we have a cat themed team comp
I want Forsaken Malzahar with a lightsaber instead of a dagger and summons droidlings.
Only after they make my dragon breeder malzahar though.

I've talked about this on Reddit and Malzahar really needs a legendary skin I mean his kit is SO visual his Q,W, and his R.  For a champ that has the most visual kit he has a ton of potential and RIto needs to use that to their advantage. 
 {{champion:90}}
as a representative of meowkai, I approve of meowzahar (and the additionally suggested kog'meow)
